title: Phase 0 - Foundation
description: Complete foundation phase: public pages, Supabase setup, auth system, member dashboard, admin basics, and initial Vercel deploy.

title: 0A: Public Pages Content & Styling
description: Populate all public placeholder pages (Home, About, Pricing, Contact) with real content and apply brand styling (red/coral #ef4444, gold/amber #f59e0b). Mobile-first responsive design.

title: Build Landing Page
description: Hero section with CTAs, class highlights grid, testimonials section, studio vibe imagery. Primary conversion: join link.

title: Build About Page
description: Studio story, mission, instructor profiles with photos/bios, studio culture section.

title: Build Pricing Page
description: Subscription plan cards (monthly, annual, drop-in) with feature comparison. CTA to /join.

title: Build Contact Page
description: Contact form (Resend), Google Maps embed, studio address/hours/phone, social links.

title: Apply Brand Styling & Responsive Polish
description: Tailwind theme config (colors, fonts), Navbar/Footer polish, responsive breakpoints (sm/md/lg/xl), shadcn/ui component setup.

title: 0B: Infrastructure Setup
description: Create Supabase project, configure auth provider (magic link), run Phase 0 schema migration (roles, members, tags, member_tags, invite_codes), set up env vars, configure Supabase client helpers.
close_reason: Infrastructure setup complete: Supabase project created and linked, env vars configured, Supabase CLI initialized. Remaining children (DB migration, client helpers) are standalone tasks.

title: Create Supabase Project & Configure Auth
description: Create Supabase project, enable Email auth provider with magic link, configure redirect URLs, set site URL.
close_reason: Supabase project created (lvtmnxrufmjkmnohdfnq) under Salsa Ninja org, linked locally, .env.local populated with keys.

title: Run Phase 0 Database Migration
description: Create Phase 0 tables: roles (with seed data), members, tags, member_tags, invite_codes. Enums, indexes, RLS policies, helper functions, triggers, views per database-schema.md.
close_reason: Full schema migrated to remote Supabase: 19 tables, enums, indexes, RLS policies, helper functions, triggers, views. Roles and channels seeded.

title: Configure Environment Variables & Supabase Client
description: Set up .env.local with SUPABASE_URL, ANON_KEY, SERVICE_ROLE_KEY, APP_URL. Create Supabase client helpers (server component client, client component client, middleware client) using @supabase/ssr.
close_reason: Installed @supabase/ssr + @supabase/supabase-js. Created server client, browser client, and middleware client helpers. Next.js middleware wired up with session refresh and route protection.

title: Authenticate & Configure Vercel + Supabase CLIs
description: Login to Vercel and Supabase CLIs, link project, configure env vars.
close_reason: Vercel CLI authenticated (farikh-3854), Supabase CLI authenticated, both tokens persist across sessions.

title: 0C: Auth System
description: Build complete auth flow: invite-only registration (QR/referral link → email → magic link → profile setup), login, logout, session persistence, route protection middleware. Ref: auth-and-roles.md, membership/technical-design.md, membership/ui-wireframes.md.

title: Build Join/Registration Flow
description: Multi-step invite-only registration: /join (enter invite code or referral link) → /join/verify (enter email, send magic link, show 'check email' screen) → /join/profile (name, avatar, dance experience) → /join/plan (subscription selection, skip for now). Validate invite codes against invite_codes table.

title: Build Login Page
description: Email input → magic link sent → 'check your email' confirmation. Returning user flow. /login route.

title: Build Auth Callback Handler
description: C:/Program Files/Git/auth/callback/route.ts — Handle magic link redirect, exchange code for session, redirect to dashboard (existing member) or /join/profile (new member).

title: Build Auth Middleware
description: middleware.ts — Supabase session check, protect (member) and (admin) route groups, role-based access per roleRoutes config, redirect unauthenticated to /login.

title: Build Logout
description: Logout API route + UI button. Clear session, redirect to home.

title: 0D: Member Dashboard & Profile
description: Build authenticated member pages: dashboard (upcoming events placeholder, announcements placeholder, quick links), profile view/edit, settings page. Role-based navigation (show/hide nav items based on role).

title: Build Member Dashboard
description: C:/Program Files/Git/dashboard — Welcome message with member name, upcoming events card (placeholder), recent announcements card (placeholder), quick action links (calendar, chat, videos based on role). Fetch current member profile from Supabase.

title: Build Profile View & Edit
description: C:/Program Files/Git/profile — View own profile, edit form (name, display name, avatar upload, phone, bio, dance experience, preferred language). View other member profiles (limited info).

title: Build Settings Page
description: C:/Program Files/Git/settings — Account settings (email display, language preference), subscription status display, logout button.

title: Build Role-Based Navigation
description: Update Navbar for authenticated users: show/hide menu items based on role permissions. Member nav (Dashboard, Calendar, Chat, Videos, Settings). Admin nav (+ Admin link). Guest nav (limited). Mobile hamburger menu.

title: 0E: Admin Basics
description: Build admin shell: dashboard with member count/stats, members list with search, invite code generation page. Owner-only access.

title: Build Admin Dashboard Shell
description: C:/Program Files/Git/admin — Stats cards (total members, active subscriptions, pending invites). Quick links to member management and invites. Owner role required.

title: Build Admin Members List
description: C:/Program Files/Git/admin/members — Table of all members with role, subscription status, join date. Search/filter. Click to view details. Manual role assignment (US-OWN-03).

title: Build Invite Code Management
description: C:/Program Files/Git/admin/invites — Generate new invite codes (single or multi-use), set expiry, view active/expired codes, copy link, generate QR code. Tracks used_count.

title: 0F: Initial Deploy
description: Connect GitHub repo to Vercel, configure env vars on Vercel, domain setup, smoke test all routes (public + auth + member + admin).
close_reason: Initial deploy complete: GitHub repo (farikh/salsa-ninja), Vercel auto-deploy from master, live at salsa-ninja-dev.vercel.app. Domain setup remaining as standalone task.

title: Connect GitHub & Deploy to Vercel
description: Push repo to GitHub, connect to Vercel, configure environment variables (Supabase URL/keys, APP_URL), set up automatic deployments from main branch.
close_reason: Vercel project salsa-ninja created, connected to GitHub repo farikh/salsa-ninja, root directory set to app/, auto-deploy on push enabled. First deploy successful.

title: Domain Setup & Smoke Test
description: Configure custom domain on Vercel, verify DNS, smoke test all routes: public pages load, auth flow works end-to-end, member dashboard accessible after login, admin pages restricted to owner.

title: Initialize Git & Push to GitHub
description: Git init at project root, create .gitignore, create GitHub repo via gh CLI, initial commit and push.
close_reason: Repo created at github.com/farikh/salsa-ninja (private), initial commit pushed to master.
